# random intercepts
fm_1 <- lme(prothrombin ~ (year + I(year^2)) * (sex + drug) + ns(age, 3) + 
                ns(age, 3) : (sex + drug), data = pbc2, 
            random = ~ 1 | id, subset = prothrombin < 18)
